replies.body: Iron Ocn isnt that hard.
replies.body_tagged: Iron Ocn isnt that hard.

reply_to.body: hue
reply_to.body_tagged: hue

replies.body:
It's insanely flukey and ping based. Diamond OCN is much more accurate.

For instance I 8 hearted Glitchy on Iron and 3 hearted him on Diamond, it really does make a big difference. In Iron it's all about who can get a few lucky shots and a combo whereas in Diamond you can pretty much forget the bow and actually get some proper sword PvP in.
replies.body_tagged:

It's insanely flukey and ping based. Diamond OCN is much more accurate.

For instance I 8 hearted Glitchy on Iron and 3 hearted him on Diamond, it really does make a big difference. In Iron it's all about who can get a few lucky shots and a combo whereas in Diamond you can pretty much forget the bow and actually get some proper sword PvP in.

replies.body:
It's allowed on MineHQ. Also, he pvped without it for a long time. He is even better without it. Also, all these kids nominating their team mates is quite funny. I really can't tell if they are trolling or not.

I haven't ran into an avicus regular who is 'amazing' at pvp, except for Tresh414. For some reason, people judge pvp skill on here by how many kills they get in nexus or nebula. There are unbalanced kits, people who would rather win than 1v1, and so on in these gamemodes.
